response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance your business operations and productivity. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $15,000 to you. After careful consideration, I propose to offer it to you for $14,000. This price reflects the product's high quality and the value it brings to its owner, while also allowing me to maintain a reasonable profit margin. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both our interests. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 14000}
